caption.p: In vitro effect of oregano oil on the sperm decondensation index. SDI was measured immediately after the addition of the EO and 5 min and 10 min treatment. The dilution of EO was done in a 0.2% ( w/ v) sterile agar solution. The percentage of SDI of each aliquot was measured after 5 min ( P = 0.48; n = 25) and 10 min ( ∗ P < 0.05; n = 25).
